title: JetBrains Marketplace listing
description:
Publish JetBrains plugin to the marketplace.

**Required:**
- Plugin description (marketing copy)
- Screenshots (light and dark theme)
- Icon (plugin icon)
- Vendor information
- Compatibility range (2023.1+)
- Change notes
- plugin.xml metadata complete

**Process:**
- Create JetBrains Marketplace vendor account
- Submit for review
- Address any review feedback
